[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@sym20/core-conversations](./core-conversations.md) &gt; [IMember](./core-conversations.imember.md)

## IMember interface

A participant in a conversation. It includes just some basic user information needed to display user information in non-user views. The user ID can be used to fetch more information about the user via the user service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMember 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [firstName](./core-conversations.imember.firstname.md) | <code>string</code> | The first name of the user. |
|  [fullName](./core-conversations.imember.fullname.md) | <code>string</code> | The full name of the user. |
|  [joinedAt](./core-conversations.imember.joinedat.md) | <code>Timestamp</code> | The point in time at which the user became a member of the conversation. |
|  [lastName](./core-conversations.imember.lastname.md) | <code>string</code> | The last name of the user. |
|  [owner](./core-conversations.imember.owner.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the user associated with the membership is an owner of the conversation. |
|  [userId](./core-conversations.imember.userid.md) | <code>UserId</code> | The ID of the user associated with the membership. |
